title: Week 1 Studs & Duds + Monday Punday - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/13
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode following a wild opening weekend of football! On today’s fantasy football podcast, get a Week 1 recap, with an outlook for Week 2 and the rest of the season. Andy, Mike, and Jason talk through the week winning fantasy football performances, and the soul-crushing disappearing acts. Plus, the latest injury news and “Monday Punday!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 13th, 2021.
  
 (01:45) - Week 1 Quick Reactions
 (05:40) - Monday Punday
 (08:30) - NFL News
 (22:55) - Week 1 Studs
 (51:35) - Week 1 Duds
